mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `t_csp_user_package_history` WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT temp.preNum / rp.pre_count * 100 AS pre,temp.proNum / rp.pro_count * 100 AS pro, date_format(temp.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as create_time FROM (SELECT DATE(update_time) AS create_time, COUNT(CASE WHEN before_package_id=2 THEN before_package_id END) AS preNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN before_package_id=3 THEN before_package_id END) AS proNum FROM `t_csp_user_package_history` WHERE before_package_id = after_package_id AND update_type = 1 and update_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE(update_time)) AS temp INNER JOIN `t_report_package` rp ON temp.create_time = rp.register_time where rp.task_type = 0
